specs.label: Pad Bundle Options
specs.value: Auteur Lambskin Perf (installed); Universe Lambskin Perf; Caldera Lambskin Ultra Perf

specs.label: Includes
specs.value: Auteur Classic Maple Headphones; ZMF Stock Braided Cable; ZMF Auteur Pads; ZMF Owner's Card; ZMF Clamshell Case; Lifetime Driver Warranty

specs.label: Notes
specs.value: Stock cable ships with an alternate termination (based on current ZMF inventory); upgraded Custom Mg12 chassis is painted (not anodized) and may wear over time; only one discounted upgrade cable can be bundled per headphone (stock cable still included); fully custom cables available via the ZMF cables page
